title: Braum's overall usefulness
body: So I just wanted to know if Braum is useful outside of support. I used to be a Braum main and I feel that he needs a few changes to make him viable in say top lane. Let me know if you can play Braum anywhere else besides support and if you agree with me.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=xdeviltwinkiex,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=T6imaYZA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-09T18:23:55.953+0000)
>
> Does this actually work?

Yeah. Once you devourer is sated you go Q -> Punch -> Doublepunch -> Passive Stun goes off. Then you get your on-hit damage from braums passive, On-hit from devour, On-hit from Titantic. Titanic also gives you good wave clear. Is it THE BEST? No. Is it legit playable? Yes.
It sounds fun and I want to try it not in ranked because I can't play ranked but I feel like people would dodge the match if I chose Braum jg.

I saw a rageblade/wits end/tf top lane braum build that was disgustingly effective not terribly long ago. If he combined in his ult to a rotation, he could basically kill anyone before they could even really do anything. (Combo basically being q for the slow, Rapid AA's to get the passive stun, weaving in w and e for more sheen procs, then ulting for the knockup.)

I don't remember the rest of his build, but I imagine frozen heart for more cdr and other tank stuff would be fine. Maybe add titanic hydra but that's probably overkill.
Cool I'm prepared to get reported for trolling or something like that. Now what if I built items on him that give ad and health, like maybe 2 or 3 of these and then just build full tank.

I'm not actually recommending lane braum to be clear, and I'm pretty sure it was normals where I saw it and it was viewed as troll-y. The cc chaining he can offer makes him not totally useless as a bruiser, but theres probably better options who could build identical items but get better scalings out of it.
Yeah I'm only doing this in normals I understand that this is not the best build and role for the champ, I just wanna have fun.
His damage is really only a threat to squishies, so there'd be very VERY few reasons to bring him out of bot in my books.
I have a problem with that, this is the guy that basically punched his way through a mountain, I would think he could do some damage.

He can burst some ADCs at level 8-ish, people underestimate that :P
He's probably just pulling punches since he's such a nice bloke.
